entry.title: How to New a Post
entry.content:
The first post

rake new_post[“YYYY-MM-DD-post-title.markdown”]

rake preview localhost:4000

Take a look also to rake generate (generates the content in the /public folder manually) and rake watch (watch for changes into /source and /sass folders and generates the files automatically)

Deploy to github pages

rake setup_github_pages[git@github.com:cibernox/cibernox.github.io.git]

rake deploy

git push origin source
